dt: {bc}marked by or given to vehement insistent outcry

pt: {sc}vociferous{/sc} {sc}clamorous{/sc} {sc}blatant{/sc} {sc}strident{/sc} {sc}boisterous{/sc} {sc}obstreperous{/sc} mean so loud or insistent as to compel attention. {sc}vociferous{/sc} implies a vehement shouting or calling out.
{sc}clamorous{/sc} may imply insistency as well as vociferousness in demanding or protesting.
{sc}blatant{/sc} implies an offensive bellowing or insensitive loudness.

pt.t: heard the {it}strident{/it} cry of the crow

pt: {sc}boisterous{/sc} suggests a noisiness and turbulence due to high spirits.
{sc}obstreperous{/sc} suggests unruly and aggressive noisiness and resistance to restraint.

shortdef: marked by or given to vehement insistent outcry
